page.title: 19Medical Services in StDavids
page.content: Doctor Middleton is the G.P.in St.Davids.He has 2200 patients on his books and on a busy day he has up to 60 patients in his surgery.The doctor has a special radio in his car so that he can speak to ambulance men if he needs them. He usually reaches people, but in the winter when there is snow on the ground if he was needed badly he would go by helicopter,tractor or he would borrow a Landrover.In 1982 there was a person who he could manage to reach as there were snow drifts of two to four feet.The farthest daily call was 420 miles there and 420 miles back.This was by helicopter to an injured man on a ship off Ireland. e.He works in the surgery from 9.00am till 10.30am then he goes on his rounds The surgery opens again at 600pm.
